name: Lucas: Sleepy Head Boi
description:
This game is a direct sequel of my previous fan game called Onett : Sleepy Head Ness. This current game makes more sense if you've played original Earthbound, Mother 3 and Onett : Sleepy Head Ness.

This game has been made with Adam Ledoux's Bitsy application for the Micro Fangame Jam.

The song is a remix I've made of Mother 3's Love Theme. Music added to bitsy with Mark Wonnacott app.
